activities: Gerald Gold & Associates, LTD, is a background screening company that provides information on applicants for employment.  We obtain HR information from our clients that includes copies of employment applications and resumes.  We contact former employers to obtain dates of employment, position, salary and interview the employer regarding job performance, ability to get along, job knowlege, reason for leaving and eligibility for rehire.  We also do criminal record checks (as permitted by law) and academic verifications.  Information is passed between our clients and our sources through e-mails and manually.

recoursemech: Similar to the Fair Credit Reporting Act.  We provide name, address and contact information that allows the applicant to contact us directory to lodge complaints.  We then pursue any information the applicant claims is in dispute in order to remedy the conflict.  If the complaint cannot be resolved internally, we will refer the applicant to the EU Data Protection Authorities.
